definition: Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation (HSBC)
luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm
Hong Kong and Shanghai Banking Corporation (HSBC)

sentences.english: This credit is available with The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation, Shanghai by negotiation against beneficiary’s drafts drawn under this L/C at sight basis.
sentences.chinese: 本信用证在上海汇丰银行议付，随附受益人即期汇票。

sentences.english: These negative side effects only add more weight to HSBC's challenges.
sentences.chinese: 裁员的负面效应使汇丰银行面临的挑战更加严峻。

sentences.english: Yesterday's reshuffle also marks the end of Mr Green's dominant role ruing the bank.
sentences.chinese: 昨日的调整也标志着葛霖在汇丰主宰地位的终结。

sentences.english: Wai-Shin Chan is director of climate-change strategy, Asia Pacific, for HSBC Global Research.
sentences.chinese: 陈伟欣，汇丰环球研究气候变化策略亚太区总监。

sentences.english: This credit is available with The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Ltd., Shanghai  by negotiation against beneficiary’s drafts drawn under this L/C at sight basis.
sentences.chinese: 本信用证在上海汇丰银行议付，随附受益人即期汇票。

sentences.english: Feng of HSBC Jintrust is still on the sidelines.
sentences.chinese: 不过，汇丰晋信的冯仍在观望。

sentences.english: A recent paper from HSBC's quantitative strategy team echoes this.
sentences.chinese: 汇丰定量分析战略小组最近的报告也显示了这一点。

sentences.english: This announcement will continue to hurt the market sentiment and the confidence on HSBC.
sentences.chinese: 这个消息会继续伤害市场情绪以及对汇丰银行的信心。

sentences.english: HSBC announced yesterday that all its 20,000-plus employees would have their pay frozen next year.
sentences.chinese: 汇丰昨日宣布集团二万名员工明年会冻薪。

sentences.english: In hong kong investors waited anxiously for hsbc holdings 'annal earnings announcement.
sentences.chinese: 香港的投资这焦急地等待汇丰银行的年度收益报告。

sentences.english: And there's HSBC and Barclays. They are here,
sentences.chinese: 还有汇丰银行和巴克莱银行。他们都在这里，

sentences.english: If the three buildings are sold, HSBC plans to lease back the space.
sentences.chinese: 汇丰控股打算售后回租这三座大楼。

sentences.english: He was also at HSBC Securities for one year.
sentences.chinese: 他亦曾为汇丰银行证券部工作过一年。

sentences.english: Stitt the bronze lion, the HSBC Shanghai Branch.
sentences.chinese: 铜狮“施迪”，香港上海汇丰银行上海分行。

sentences.english: We reached HSBC Bungalow at Cameron Highlands in time for afternoon tea.
sentences.chinese: 我们在午餐时间抵达金马伦高原的汇丰银行别墅。
